description: An individual block in the metadata chain that captures the history of modifications of a dataset.

blockHash.description: Hash sum of this metadata block's information.

prevBlockHash.description: Hash sum of the preceding block.

systemTime.description: System time when this block was written.

outputSlice.description: Describes output data written during this transaction, if any.

outputWatermark.description:
Last watermark of the output data stream.
Watermarks are usually derived from the event times in data based on the properties of the source,
but sometimes they can also be assigned manually. Manual watermarks are useful in cases of slow-moving
datasets in order to let the computations continue even when no new events were observed for a long time.

inputSlices.description: Defines input datasets and their data slices used in this block, if any.

source.description: Contains the definition of the source of data when it changes.

vocab.description: Vocabulary lets you change system column names to avoid conflicts.
